Package com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.money

Interface ObservableExchangeRateProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.money.convert.ExchangeRateProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider, BitfinexXChangeRateProvider, CoinbaseXChangeRateProvider, DynamicXChangeRateProvider, ItBitXChangeRateProvider

    public interface ObservableExchangeRateProvider
extends javax.money.convert.ExchangeRateProvider

    ExchangeRateProvider extension that allows an observer to be notified of exchange rate updates
